Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • aeneas.models.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A hexonimo or piece used to play KabaSuji.
    See Also:
